scripts.sass-debug: node-sass scss/site.scss -o wwwroot/css/ --include-path node_modules/ --include-path node_modules/@syncfusion/ --source-map true
scripts.sass-release: del wwwroot\css\site.* /Q & node-sass scss/site.scss -o wwwroot/css/ --include-path node_modules/ --include-path node_modules/@syncfusion/ --output-style compressed
